name: Cube
title: cube.dev
shortDescription: Cube is a universal semantic layer platform that modernizes the traditional OLAP approach to data management. It is designed for enterprise teams to ensure consistent data models and metrics across various applications. By integrating Cube, organizations can enhance their data analytics capabilities, making data fast and reliable for consumption and AI applications. An example use case would be a large corporation using Cube to streamline data access and analysis across multiple departments, improving decision-making processes.

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Looker
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Offers robust BI and analytics tools
